item.description:
Beginners chanting practice. Traditionally chanting is done in Shindoku, a form of faith reading. We chant in Shindoku and sometimes in English. Shindoku chanting is a form of meditation. Because of this we do not have to academically understand what we chant. Our inner Buddha nature understands. Ichi Ichi Mon Mon practice is done slowly and with a musical beat to help beginners learn the pronunciations. Beginners Chanting practice is held every Sunday at 9 am to 9:30. If you would like to practice chanting or improve your chanting, please join us.

www.newenglandbuddhist.org

Â
item.name: Beginners Chanting Practice
